The Begining of Ragnarox............Chapter2: The First Battle
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: The Begining of Ragnarox............Chapter2: The First Battle
By Zercker on Saturday, April 28, 2007 - 11:44 am:

"Our next battle will be a pair of trainers against another pair!" Yelled the announcer. "We have Drew with Swift and Genn with Angel against John with Rocky and Ben with Inferno!" Said the announcer over the intercom. "Are you ready?" Drew asked Genn and Swift. "Yep lets go out there and own!" She said. Drew and Genn walked out onto the field and walked into the trainer box. "Ready....Set....BATTLE!!!" Yelled the referee. John shouted something to his Golem, Rocky. It took off its head and threw it at
Swift. Swift jumped out of the way and howled. "Swift use Charge!" I yelled. Swift ran at the Golem and jumped up and slamed into the it but bounced right off. "Rocky is too hard for me to damage him." Drew said to Genn. "Ok, Angel take the Golem." She yelled. Swift then charged at Inferno a Dragon and bashed into it. "Quick while the Dragon is on the ground use Step!" I yelled. Swift ran around in a zig zag then bashed into Inferno. Meanwhile Angel just knocked Rocky over with FairyDust. "Now Swift finish Inferno off with a Bolt!" I yell. Swift suddenly unleashed a large bolt of lightning fainting the Dragon. "Now double attack!" I yell. "Swift use Botlh!" I yell. "Angel use Star Shower!" Yells Genn. They bolth charge up and fire at the same time just as Rocky spins into a Tornado. A big explosien and Rocky is laying on the ground fainted. "Congratulations to Swift and Aero they are now moving on to Rank D!" Yells the anouncer. "Good job Genn and Swift." Says Drew. Later that evening while Drew is Disc hunting. "Chi-chi!" Yells Chi. Drew runs over to see Mocchi has found a Disc. "Good job Chi!" Praises Drew.

*************************************************
MEANWHILE

"Xevion,Moo we have ensembled enough monsters for an army." Says a ChaosDurahan. "Great GeneralDurahan" Hissed Xevion. "We attack Vizley at dawn." Moo belowed. "Yes my lords." It said and ran away.
